glsa.title: Links: SSL verification vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: An error in the verification of SSL certificates in Links might enable remote attackers to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks.

background.p: Links is a fast lightweight text and graphic web-browser.

description.p: A SSL verification vulnerability and two unspecified vulnerabilities have been discovered in Links. Please review the Secunia Advisory referenced below for details.

impact.p: An attacker might conduct man-in-the-middle attacks. The unspecified errors could allow for out-of-bounds reads and writes.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Links users should upgrade to the latest version:
